creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation
inscription: on back of collar, PR side, in red: 56.15
medium: Made in two connected sections, iron and the interior in red lacquer
signed: Under the chin: ⽇本唯⼀甲冑良⼯　明珍式部紀宗察; side: 武州江戸　於權⽥原　造之; 元⽂⼆年⼆⽉吉祥日 (Made in Bushū, Edo at Gondawara on a fortuitous day in the 2nd month of the 2nd year of Genbun (1737) by the greatest armor-smith in Japan, Myōchin Shikibu Ki no Muneakira.)
title: Hammered iron full-face armor mask
